sentences.en: A friend of mine sent me some pictures of Athens this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天早晨,我的一位朋友给我寄来几幅雅典画片.

sentences.en: All Athens swore to carry out his demands.
sentences.cn: 所有的雅典人都发誓效忠于他.

sentences.en: Athens had turned against its most brilliant and virtuous citizen.
sentences.cn: 雅典把矛头指向其最有才有德的人.

sentences.en: Athens is often called the queen of the Aegean.
sentences.cn: 雅典时常被人称为爱琴海上的皇后.

sentences.en: Athens was suffering under the rule of an oligarchy that had no concern for the people's welfare.
sentences.cn: 雅典当时饱受寡头集团的统治，他们对人民的福祉毫不关心。

sentences.en: Can you tell me something about the Acropolis in Athens?
sentences.cn: 你能给我讲一些关于雅典卫城的事吗?

sentences.en: Cardinal de Bricassart chartered a private plane to Athens.
sentences.cn: 德?布里卡撒特红衣大主教获得特许乘坐一架私人飞机去雅典.

sentences.en: From the hill we looked out over the rooftops of Athens.
sentences.cn: 我们从山上眺望雅典建筑的顶部。

sentences.en: He quit his job as an office boy in Athens.
sentences.cn: 他辞去了在雅典当办公室勤杂工的工作。

sentences.en: I asked the Captain to wangle us three tickets to Athens.
sentences.cn: 我让机长设法给我们弄3张去雅典的票。

sentences.en: If you’re on a cruise through the Mediterranean, you might only have one day in Athens.
sentences.cn: 假如你在一个穿越地中海的乘船观光团上，你就大概只能在雅典呆一天。

sentences.en: It was about 40 kilometres from Athens - the capital of the country.
sentences.cn: 距离首都雅典大约有40公里.

sentences.en: One of them was Attica ; its centre, the city of Athens.
sentences.cn: 其中之一便是阿提卡城邦, 它的中心便是雅典.

sentences.en: The best thing for me is that I have equaled what I have done at Athens.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，最好的事情是，我取得了在雅典曾经取得过的成绩。

sentences.en: The differences between Athens and Washington seem to be very far.
sentences.cn: 雅典与华盛顿特区的差别,似乎非常遥远。

sentences.en: The hymn was written by an obscure Greek composer for the 1896 Athens Olympics.
sentences.cn: 这首赞歌是希腊一位名不见经传的作曲家为1896年的雅典奥运会创作的。

sentences.en: They'd come on a direct flight from Athens.
sentences.cn: 他们搭乘由雅典直飞这里的航班过来的。

sentences.en: Those were the halcyon days of Athens ( fifth century BC ) when she produced her finest poetry and drama, architecture and sculpture.
sentences.cn: 公元5世纪为雅典的太平盛世.雅典最优秀的诗歌、戏剧 、 建筑和雕刻均产生于这一时期.

sentences.en: We coordinate the reports from the overseas divisions, and send them on to headquarters in Athens.
sentences.cn: 我们整理了海外各部门的报告然后再将其转发给雅典的总部。
